title: Error when saving to SQL
author: ericgunby
body_snippet:
I was able to create the SQL db just fine and can map to it from mRemoteNG, but when I import and save the connections I get errors.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73240375/96735080-cb26ee80-1380-11eb-8859-8c43645a931d.png)


## Expected Behavior
I would assume it should be saving the connection information up to SQL.

## Current Behavior
Errors instead of saving.

comments.snippet:
I was having the same problem, but had success on solving it.
You MUST save connection file just after configuring the nRemoteNG to SQL, and BEFORE adding any connection.

If you try to create any connection prior to save the connection file, it will fail.

comments.snippet:
Implemented a SQL schema compatibility hardening pass in my fork that targets this family of DB save errors (including Missing the DataColumn DisableCursorBlinking). 
 
Changes in fork commit https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/commit/cd6eee37 : 
- always load SQL reader schema even when tblCons has 0 rows 
- auto-add missing serializer-required columns for partial or outdated SQL schemas 
- regression test added for missing-column schema handling 
 
CI validation green on x86/x64/A...
